content.text:
Context, for others like me who were unaware:

>> [If you work for Barstool and want to have a private chat about the unionization process, how little power your boss has to stop you, and how you can leverage that power to make your life better: my DMs are open.](https://twitter.com/RafiLetzter/status/1161092601036058625)
>> 
>> -- Rafi Letzer (staff writer at https://www.livescience.com/)
>
> [If you work for @barstoolsports and DM this man I will fire you on the spot](https://twitter.com/stoolpresidente/status/1161268795278790658)
>
> -- Dave Portnoy (founder of https://www.barstoolsports.com/)
